snippet: Players at Minnesota State, Mankato, refused to practice for their former coach, who was reinstated by an arbitrator.
abstract: Minnesota State football players refuse to practice for their former coach Todd Hoffner, who returned to campus after arbitrator ruled he was unfairly fired in wake of child pornography investigation that ultimately cleared him.
lead_paragraph: Players at Minnesota State, Mankato, refused to practice for their former coach, who was reinstated by an arbitrator.
